# RabbitMQ Eventing components

image:https://img.shields.io/badge/go.dev-reference-007d9c?logo=go&logoColor=white[go.dev reference,link=https://pkg.go.dev/knative.dev/eventing-rabbitmq]
image:https://goreportcard.com/badge/knative-sandbox/eventing-rabbitmq[Go Report Card,link=https://goreportcard.com/report/knative-sandbox/eventing-rabbitmq]
image:https://img.shields.io/github/release-pre/knative-sandbox/eventing-rabbitmq.svg[Releases,link=https://github.com/knative-sandbox/eventing-rabbitmq/releases]
image:https://img.shields.io/github/license/knative-sandbox/eventing-rabbitmq.svg[LICENSE,link=https://github.com/knative-sandbox/eventing-rabbitmq/blob/master/LICENSE]
image:https://codecov.io/gh/knative-sandbox/eventing-rabbitmq/branch/master/graph/badge.svg[codecov,link=https://codecov.io/gh/knative-sandbox/eventing-rabbitmq]
image:https://img.shields.io/badge/testgrid-eventing_rabbitmq-informational?logo=data:image/x-icon;base64,[TestGrid,link=https://testgrid.knative.dev/eventing-rabbitmq]
image:https://img.shields.io/badge/Signup-Knative_Slack-white.svg?logo=slack[Slack,link=https://slack.knative.dev]
image:https://img.shields.io/badge/%23eventing-white.svg?logo=slack&color=522a5e[Slack,link=https://knative.slack.com/archives/C9JP909F0]

This repository contains a work-in-progress eventing components using RabbitMQ
as an implementation.

____
See <https://github.com/knative/eventing-contrib/pull/336> for background /
discussion.
____

## Nightly Artifacts

For RabbitMQ Broker,

[source,sh]
----
kubectl apply -f https://storage.googleapis.com/knative-nightly/eventing-rabbitmq/latest/rabbitmq-broker.yaml
----

For RabbitMQ Source,

[source,sh]
----
kubectl apply -f https://storage.googleapis.com/knative-nightly/eventing-rabbitmq/latest/rabbitmq-source.yaml
----

'''

This repo falls under the
https://github.com/knative/community/blob/master/CODE-OF-CONDUCT.md[Knative Code of Conduct].
